name: treatment of used industrial electronic device, mechanical treatment | used industrial electronic device | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/7576/documentation

The process represents the treatment 'used industrial electronic device' by mechanical dismantling in various fractions.

The activity starts with the waste being available at the gate of the treatment facility. Collection and transportation of the waste to the treatment plant is not included.

This  activity ends when the used industrial electronic device has been dismantled mechanically.
category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/383:Materials recovery/3830:Materials recovery

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Modelling parameters are not specific to this geography.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: 4-step-procedure (shredder - separation - shredder - separation) as used currently
